welcome.title: Welcome to StrideGuide
welcome.content: I'll guide you with short sounds and clear directions. You can use me offline, in English or French.

perms.title: Allow camera and sound
perms.content: The camera helps me see obstacles. Tap once to allow sound so I can speak and beep.

start.title: Start & Stop
start.content: Tap the big Start button to begin guidance. Tap again to stop. You will hear beeps after you allow sound.

finder.title: Find your items
finder.content: Teach me your keys with a few photos. I'll beep faster and say "Found keys" when they're centered.

sos.title: SOS help
sos.content: Press and hold the SOS button for 1 second. Release to cancel. I'll open a text to your emergency contact.

done.title: You're ready
done.content: Big buttons. Clear sounds. Works offline. You can replay this tutorial anytime in Settings.

install.hint: Install for offline access and faster startup
install.iosHint: Add to Home Screen for best experience
sos.cooldown: Please wait before using SOS again.
